item.title: Smart Mirror
item.description: A while ago I built a smart mirror to help keep track of the time and appointments throughout the day. It currently sits on my desk but will eventually be moved to the bathroom. It recently stopped working so I decided to use this opportunity to document it properly and record the workarounds to all the “little nigglies” that came up in the course of the project. Basic design The mirror is simply an LCD screen behind a pane of one way glass.
